TopicTitle: Request your custom made Fowler Flap

Articles.Content:
Hope this is the right forum... If not I´m sorry

I just wanted to say that my custom fowler flap requests are still open.
If you got a plane planned or already done doesn´t matter, just tell me what you need and I´ll get back to you as soon as I can. I can NOT guarantee that I will make flaps for all requests, but I´ll try at least.
More info here:
https://kerbalx.com/HB_Stratos/Mk0-Nano-Fowler-Flap
Also an example of what I have already made is there, so it this fits your needs feel free to use it!

 



HB Stratos over and out

Edited February 19, 2019 by HB Stratos
I'm moving this to the SpaceCraft Exchange, as it seems to fit better there than in S&D.   But this is really awesome of you!  Have a like!
Hmmm. I might have a need of this eventually. I’ll keep this in mind for when I start building my next stupid plane thing.
Wow, thats really cool. Reminds me of the stock hinge tail fins I made for my F-18 replica.
